title: Stop talking to your car: Voice-activated systems shown to distract drivers
text:
Stop talking to your car: Voice-activated systems shown to distract drivers 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
A new study suggests the voice-activated systems many vehicles tout as your smart interaction system are distracting drivers from the road, ...
